source.initial:
IF $$toggle::a::b$$ $$toggle::<::>::<>$$ b THEN
  min := a
ELSE
  min := b
ENDIF
source.instructions:
Construct a function by drag&dropping and reordering lines from the
            left to the right.
            The constructed function should set the value of variable min to be the smaller of variables a and b.
source.name: language translation grader 2
